name: Carol G. Peck Elementary School Reviews

review.title: “Carol G Peck”
review.pros: Pros – The children are what will keep you going. The only gratification I get from working at this school is to watch them grow and learn.
review.cons: Cons – The organization, true values, competency of some members, treatment and value placed on it's teachers is low, poor communication between faculty.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Reconsider treatment of employees and values, increase safety by hiring more one on one members, and increase training for paraprofessional staff members
